      • getGamebyCode

        public static Game getGamebyCode(Game[] games,
                                 int code)
                          throws invalidChoiceException
        Polymorphism OverLoading function to search for the game with the code given in only the available national games
        Parameters:
        games - the available games in the system
        code - the code of the game the user choosed
        Returns:
        the national game with the code the user choosed
        Throws:
        invalidChoiceException - if the code was note found among the national games available
